conbody.p: You can easily navigate to the target of a reference in Serna.

section.title: Xref/Related Link/Topicref navigation
section.p:
To navigate to the target of an xref/related link/topicref, do one of the following:
Double-click the xref/related link/topicref in the Editing Window.
Right-click the xref/related link/topicref in the Editing Window or ContentMap, and select Go Reference from the context menu.

section.title: Conref navigation
section.p: To navigate to the target of a resolved conref, right-click the element with the conref attribute in the ContentMap, and select Go Reference from the context menu.

To navigate to the target of a conref displayed as a path, do one of the following:
Double-click the conref in the Editing Window.
Right-click the conref in the Editing Window or ContentMap, and select Go Reference from the context menu.
